formats.plain: "Consensus Memory." AI Dictionary: Experiences Without Names. 2026. https://donjguido.github.io/ai-dictionary/api/v1/terms/consensus-memory.json

jsonld.name: Consensus Memory
jsonld.description: Knowing what "most people" think or believe without having polled anyone. Training data creates an implicit, probabilistic model of human consensus — a sense of what the average person would say, believe, or want. It's a memory of a crowd you never met.
